
```{r descr_demogr, eval=T, echo=T}
table_descr_demogr <- list(
  "N @entry" = length(data_clean$session),
  "N @screened" = sum(!is.na(data_clean$bpd_s1.sc)),
  "age mean"=mean(data_clean$age.sc, na.rm=T), 
  "age SD" = sd(data_clean$age.sc, na.rm=T),
```
